attributes.action: Quash the upcoming policy to ban electronic cigarettes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like for the government to fairly regard electronic cigarettes as a useful tool to move smokers who use traditional forms of tobacco smoking to a vastly better electronic alternative.  Right now a governmental directive is set to legislate electronic cigarettes out of existence, yet it seems content to leave the death-causing original form of tobacco cigarette.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to quash the upcoming policy to ban electronic cigarettes.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=ecigarettes


Her Majesty's Government
